name: 7th International Conference on Environmental Pollution, Treatment and Protection (ICEPTP'21)
content: The 7th International Conference on Environmental Pollution, Treatment and Protection (ICEPTP'21) aims to become the leading annual conference in fields related to environmental pollution, treatment and protection. The goal of ICEPTP'21 is to gather scholars from all over the world to present advances in the relevant fields and to foster an environment conducive to exchanging ideas and information. This conference will also provide an ideal environment to develop new collaborations and meet experts on the fundamentals, applications, and products of the mentioned fields. ICEPTP'21 is an acronym for International Conference on Environmental Pollution, Treatment, and Protection.
